alumni.name: Rohan Shrestha
alumni.quote: Consistent practice with past IMO problems and understanding core concepts deeply was key to my success.
preparationTips: Focus on problem-solving techniques, not just memorization
Join study groups and discuss solutions
Learn from mistakes and analyze failed attempts

alumni.name: Anjali Thapa
alumni.quote: Experimental physics practice and theoretical understanding must go hand in hand for IPhO success.
preparationTips: Time management in exams is crucial

alumni.name: Sanjay Gurung
alumni.quote: Algorithm practice on Codeforces and studying classic problems daily helped me reach gold medal level.
preparationTips: Practice on competitive programming platforms daily
Learn from editorial solutions after contests

alumni.name: Priya Maharjan
alumni.quote: Understanding reaction mechanisms and practicing laboratory safety are essential for chemistry olympiad.

alumni.name: Kamal Bhandari
alumni.quote: Integrating practical lab experience with theoretical biology knowledge was crucial for my preparation.
preparationTips: Cover all IBO syllabus topics systematically
Stay updated with recent biological discoveries
Use diagrams to understand complex processes

alumni.name: Suraj Tamang
alumni.quote: Observational practice with telescopes and understanding celestial mechanics were my strongest preparation strategies.
preparationTips: Learn to use star charts and planetarium software
Study planetary motion and orbits thoroughly

alumni.name: Maya Rai
alumni.quote: Pattern recognition and logical thinking are more important than language knowledge for IOL success.
preparationTips: Work on problems with teammates for diverse perspectives

alumni.name: Bikram Adhikari
alumni.quote: Geometry and number theory require special attention. I spent months mastering these topics specifically.
preparationTips: Build strong foundations in all four IMO areas
Study from Art of Problem Solving books
